channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP-Table Reloaded
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP-Table Reloaded

item.title: CVE-2022-4491|2024-08-03T01:41:45.144Z -- unknown -- wp-table%20reloaded
item.description: The WP-Table Reloaded WordPress plugin through 1.9.4 does not validate and escapes some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in the page, which could allow users with a role as low as a contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks, which could be used against high privilege users such as admins.
